html:
10.8.20  4:36 pm   when is the essential bill wurtz coming out on cd? would love to own it, thanks for the songs

      i don't think CDs are big enough to hold the amount of music i would want to put on there

10.8.20  3:18 pm   When are you going to make your next video

      doing it now

10.8.20  2:56 pm   I'm looking forward to see what you've been working on, er rather what part of it you'll show. In the meantime I'll work on my own stuff.

What part do you enjoy most? Working on a project, finishing a project, releasing a project, or starting a new project?

      i only enjoy the moments where i have convinced myself to believe that one day i may figure out how to do this at a much more respectable pace

10.8.20  1:45 pm   What was the first video you made that used a 3d graphic?

      history of the entire world i guess

10.8.20  12:04 pm   How many trees are in a forest?

      too many to comprehend

10.8.20  10:58 am   what are the stages of videomaking?

      worry, panic, pure bliss, worry, then panic

10.8.20  9:51 am   i feel like i always have so much to do and am always coming up with new ideas to the point that i have 9 projects i am currently working on and 6 more that i haven't started. i realize that by having 9 active projects i am not getting any done, so how do you (as a fellow person exploding/imploding with ideas) focus on just one at a time?

      first, figure out if there is any reason why any of them SHOULD be first. if none of them stand out, then go to random dot org, and trust in the holy power of random dot org, because the 1st project will lead to your next project which will lead to the next and therefore all projects, in a decisively forward line, thanks to the holy and decisive power of random dot org

10.8.20  9:30 am   10.7.20  5:17 pm what other formats? cassette and CD maybe?

      whatever seems to have the highest capacity and longest lifespan

10.8.20  9:27 am   what's incredible but also completely confusing

      the whole world

10.8.20  8:51 am   What's your favorite improv session that's currently available on this site?

      put it this way, i'm just glad that 'traded a windmill for my chevrolet' line finally got out. i used to stress out daily wondering if that line would ever make it out there

10.8.20  7:51 am   where did you learn to draw so well?

      at home

10.8.20  7:14 am   will you ever do song without stict rhythm?

      sure

10.8.20  6:21 am   What is 'rock' music

      normal music

10.8.20  5:44 am   do you ever plan to release an album? if not would you maybe release a comp of your best music in your opinion?

      i would prefer to release song after song after song after song after song after song and so on in that pattern except with other videos in between too

10.8.20  4:23 am   what's a dream you had that you can recall really really well?

      a bob ross episode, he's doing a painting (obviously), and he's doing a bush in the lower right, probably a snowy bush, but here's the thing, instead of doing it the normal way, he gets a huge glob of white. like a huge ball of white paint, as big as a golf ball maybe. so he's doing the bush with this massive ball of white paint, and then it actually falls on the floor, he says oops and tries again, also he's talking about another interesting television show on another channel called 'Thursday to Paint', also telling us he doesn't really like that show very much and generally doesn't respect it. So anyway, he's working on doing this bush with a huge white glob of paint, and it falls on the floor a second time, and finally he decides to just, do it the normal way i guess (not with a huge glob), and so that works fine, then he leans down and cleans up those other 2 globs from before and says, embarrassed, 'that was just like Thursday to Paint.' 'That was some Thursday to Paint Shiat.'

10.8.20  3:15 am   Would you say your most recent song would be your favorite until the next one comes along?

      if it's in the past, it's not my favorite because the plan is always to make more

10.8.20  2:30 am   When you say the song is nearly out does that mean it is actually a medium amount of time out?

      it's a short time compared to some of the other times

10.8.20  1:08 am   are you excited with what you have learned during your recent experimentation?

      yes

10.8.20  12:58 am   When you want to make multiple things but you need to focus on only one to get it done, how do you choose which one?

      first, figure out if there is any reason why any of them SHOULD be first. if none of them stand out, then go to random dot org, and trust in the holy power of random dot org, because the 1st project will lead to your next project which will lead to the next and therefore all projects, in a decisively forward line, thanks to the holy and decisive power of random dot org

10.8.20  12:40 am   what does x equal?

      how about 1 for now

10.8.20  12:16 am   what is your opinion on canned salmon?

      i always mix it up with sanned calmon

10.7.20  11:35 pm   how far along would you say the video is currently?

      maybe about 2 minutes but that's only on the first of 4 stages. unless you count the stage before it which was the song/audio, which is done

10.7.20  11:25 pm   bill have you ever eaten paper?

     no

      I did once when I was little but I wonder about anyone else

10.7.20  11:00 pm   do you know any fast-paced but chill rock songs?

      how about 'come see about me'

10.7.20  10:18 pm   So far, in the video making process of your new video, have you gotten to the part in the process where you put your analasyis of a lake in the pan?

      thank you for reminding me, it is probably time to do that now

10.7.20  10:10 pm   what's your advice on making muffins i just spent five hours trying to make them and they burnt 

      i have never made a muffin

10.7.20  9:45 pm   Hi bill, I love you're music it's amazing, you inspire me to make music.

      holy crab you are very friendly

10.7.20  9:39 pm   Bill, huge fan, wondering whether you have a favourite song or a few favourite songs that you've made. Perhaps a few you're proudest of?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.7.20  9:25 pm   What is your opinion on nihilism?

      it means nothing to me

10.7.20  9:23 pm   can I name my frog Einstein 

      sure, but it is also allowed to name you that, so watch out

10.7.20  8:25 pm   Can you give me an example of a scientific question? I need help with my homework. 

      under what conditions does shit become crap

10.7.20  8:00 pm   What are your thoughts on eating shredded cheese at 3 am? 

      if you're not careful you may still be eating it at 3:01

10.7.20  7:59 pm   what's your favourite song you made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.7.20  5:52 pm   can you define time without using a reference to time in the definition?

      i can't define it at all, even if i CAN refer to it

10.7.20  5:34 pm   How are the 3D animations going?

      there's good news and bad news. the bad news is it worsens the condition i have where my brain insists on complicating things at every moment. the good news is, it actually allows me to get more mileage out of simple things than ever before

10.7.20  5:31 pm   How do i solve my technical difficulties

      write a reasonable length essay detailing everything you know about the problem, why you know it's a problem, what you've tried, just everything you know about it. then go for a walk around your neighborhood or maybe the next neighborhood over. and then write the essay again. keep repeating these steps

10.7.20  5:22 pm   I like your music, and you have inspired me to play music, your music is just, different, that's why I like it.

      holy pant leg, you are quite friendly

10.7.20  5:17 pm   have you considered pressing some of your songs on vinyl or other physical formats?

     not vinyl but maybe some other formats

     would buy in an instant.

     how do i know you aren't......... bluffing

10.7.20  4:05 pm   What is the perfect object?

      if you want perfect, an object is probably not gonna work

10.7.20  3:33 pm   i wrote a melody that goes like this: "dumm de-du-deee dum-de-du-dee da-du-de-da(,) dumm dee-dee-daa dum-da-de-deee, dumm dee-dee-dee dum-dee-daaa (di di daa) *pling* [pause]" then it repeats. what should the lyrics be about?

      life on our interesting planet

10.7.20  3:14 pm   are the lyrics that speak about a road in "long long long journey" (e.g. 'and the road doesn't end,' etc.) a reference to or inspired by your 2014 song "the road?"

      no, but they were both inspired by the same thing, and that is roads

10.7.20  3:05 pm   how much does your brain explode lately

      jack black voice "all of the fucking waay"

10.7.20  1:37 pm   How many typos would you guess are on this page?

      technically just one huge typo

10.7.20  1:33 pm   why is the cabinet improv a whole banger

      selective editing, i'm sure

10.7.20  1:17 pm   Is there a detail in one of your songs that you wish someone would point out or notice?

      all of them

10.7.20  11:56 am   I own a yamaha DX7 and a TR-808 but I cant record multi-track recordings for the life of me. any tips?

      try writing what you are going to record first. HOW to record something is complicated enough, without even worrying about WHAT you are going to record. so get the 'what' squared away before you even start. Improvisation is great, but it's a little difficult to improvise multiple instruments that you are not playing simultaneously

10.7.20  11:51 am   what are you uploading next 

      a music video

10.7.20  11:32 am   are you still learning the language of love?

      yes

10.7.20  10:48 am   Why is art?

      sometimes it's the only way to explain what the heck is going on

10.7.20  10:38 am   do video/song ideas ever come to you in a dream?

      yes
